original_title: Behind Bars- Germany's Most Dangerous Jail
overview: Aachen Prison is both Germanyâ€™s most dangerous and most secure prison. It houses murderers, sex offenders and pedophiles. Their cells are inspected regularly.  It offers space for over 700 prisoners. Who works here, who is serving what for? And how do relatives deal with the arrest of a family member? In our prison documentary we take a look behind the bars.
title: Behind Bars- Germany's Most Dangerous Jail
